show_name: Doraemon the Movie: Nobita's Little Space War
other_title: Eiga Doraemon: Nobita no Little Star Wars (Japanese)
哆啦A梦剧场版：大雄与宇宙小战争 (Chinese (PRC))
大雄的宇宙小戰爭 (Chinese (Hong Kong))
映画ドラえもん のび太の宇宙小戦争（リトル・スター・ウォーズ） (Japanese)
plot: Papi, the tiny president of a faraway planet, escapes to Earth to avoid being captured by the military forces that took over. Despite being welcomed by Doraemon, Nobita and their friends, the little alien notices that his enemies have also reached this world and Papi definitely doesn't want to get his human friends involved in this war. Doraemon, Nobita, Jyaian, Suneo, and Shizuka start a big adventure as they try to hide and protect Papi
